summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Public Health Department; adopting a new Seattle Food Code and repealing the present one to conform to requirements of state law; regulating the construction, maintenance, and operation of food service establishments and the storage, sale, and serving of foods therein; requiring permits; defining offenses and prescribing penalties; repealing Seattle Municipal Code Chapter 10.11 and Ordinances 109910 as last amended by Ordinance 116437, 112024, 114582, 114838 as amended by Ordinance 116436, and 116437.
committee: Housing, Health, Human Services and Education
